keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map <space>q passNextKey
# map e focusInput

map <space>wq removeTab
map <space>bd removeTab
map <space>fr Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <space>e Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map <space>dt duplicateTab

map u restoreTab

map <S-Tab> previousTab
map <Tab> nextTab

map H goBack
map L goForward

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
# map <space>fi LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode
map ? showHelp
